name: Super Vadimka II Revenge of Dr. Kulik
storyline:
Super Vadimka II Revenge of Dr. Kulik is a PC game that was released by VadimBallzGame on January 4, 2022. Based on the first part, it is a direct continuation.
Super Vadimka after the nightmarish events of the first part were completed, the main character Vadim Kulev was able to start passing new crazy levels. He again has to stop Dr. Kulechek...
summary: Super Vadimka II Revenge of Dr. Kulik - the cross-platform horror video game in the platformer genre was released on January 4, 2022 is a sequel to Super Vadimka (2021) to become even more difficult is considered a very difficult game by many fans of zhardkor help the boy Vadim to survive for the second time the dangerous path that God created so much for the punishment of the child
